snippet.title: Atomic Rock Paper Scissors (a game for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam - Theme: "Unstable")
snippet.description:
This weekend was Ludum Dare 49 game-making event, the theme was "Unstable". Me and my sister joined the jam together. Here's a gameplay video of our entry: ATOMIC ROCK PAPERS SCISSORS! You can play it here: https://1ucas.itch.io/atomic-rock-paper-scissors

I did the code, music and some minor graphics, and she did the graphics, sounds and some of the game design as well.

I actually think the idea we came up with is pretty fun. Needs balancing, but it could be a good game. We're gonna start working on a mobile version together.
